sqlMap.select: SELECT F.MNG_YEAR MNG_YEAR ,F.MNG_NO MNG_NO ,F.MNG_SEQ MNG_SEQ ,F.RNTFEE_SEQ RNTFEE_SEQ ,F.RENT_DETAIL_REGIST_SEQ RENT_DETAIL_REGIST_SEQ ,(SELECT E.ENTRPS_NM FROM ENTRPS_INFO_F E WHERE E.ENTRPSCD = R.ENTRPS_CD) ENTRPS_NM ,GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM062', R.BOUND_CD) BOUND_NM ,NVL(D.RENT_AR, 0) RENT_AR ,DECODE(D.RENT_AR_SE, '1', '물류부지', '2', '제조부지', '3', '숙성실', '') RENT_AR_SE_NM ,TO_CHAR(F.APPLC_BEGIN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') APPLC_BEGIN_DT ,TO_CHAR(F.APPLC_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') APPLC_END_DT ,NVL(F.APPLC_RNTFEE, 0) APPLC_RNTFEE ,D.PRICE_SE PRICE_SE ,DECODE(R.TERMN_DT, NULL, 'N', 'Y') TERMN_YN ,DECODE(F.NTIC_SEQ, NULL, 'N', 'Y') NTIC_YN ,F.RM RM FROM HTLD_RNTFEE_F F INNER JOIN (SELECT A.* FROM HTLD_RENT_DETAIL_HIST_F A WHERE A.HIST_SEQ = GAM_GET_HTLD_RENT_HIST_SEQ(A.MNG_YEAR, A.MNG_NO, A.MNG_SEQ, #histDt#)) D ON D.MNG_YEAR = F.MNG_YEAR AND D.MNG_NO = F.MNG_NO AND D.MNG_SEQ = F.MNG_SEQ AND D.REGIST_SEQ = F.RENT_DETAIL_REGIST_SEQ INNER JOIN (SELECT B.* FROM HTLD_RENT_HIST_F B WHERE B.HIST_SEQ = GAM_GET_HTLD_RENT_HIST_SEQ(B.MNG_YEAR, B.MNG_NO, B.MNG_SEQ, #histDt#)) R ON D.MNG_YEAR = R.MNG_YEAR AND D.MNG_NO = R.MNG_NO AND D.MNG_SEQ = R.MNG_SEQ WHERE F.MNG_YEAR = #mngYear# AND F.MNG_NO = #mngNo# AND F.MNG_SEQ = #mngSeq# AND F.RNTFEE_SEQ = #rntfeeSeq# AND F.RNTFEE_SE = '1'
sqlMap.update: UPDATE HTLD_RNTFEE_F SET APPLC_BEGIN_DT = TO_DATE(#applcBeginDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ,APPLC_END_DT = TO_DATE(#applcEndDt#, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ,APPLC_RNTFEE = TO_NUMBER(#applcRntfee#) ,RNTFEE = TO_NUMBER(#rntfee#) ,UPD_USR = #updUsr# ,UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE MNG_YEAR = #mngYear# AND MNG_NO = #mngNo# AND MNG_SEQ = #mngSeq# AND RNTFEE_SEQ = #rntfeeSeq# AND RNTFEE_SE = '1'
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM HTLD_RNTFEE_F WHERE MNG_YEAR = #mngYear# AND MNG_NO = #mngNo# AND MNG_SEQ = #mngSeq# AND RNTFEE_SEQ = #rntfeeSeq# AND RNTFEE_SE = '1'
